annotations: LOCATION:         45 Rue du Sucre, Montreal, QC, Canada

Camille is an award-winning pastry chef with 8 years of experience in artisanal and fine-dining dessert creation. Renowned for modern twists on traditional French pastries, she specializes in chocolate work, plated desserts, and seasonal tarts. Highly skilled in precision baking, kitchen team leadership, and visual presentation.
- Created signature dessert lines featured in Gourmet Québec Magazine.
- Managed a 6-person pastry team, including training and seasonal product development.
- Reduced kitchen waste by 18% through creative ingredient reuse.
- Assisted in developing high-end wedding and event desserts.
- Specialized in entremets, glazes, and chocolate sculpting.
- Prepared doughs, mousses, and garnishes for daily service.
- Gained expertise in viennoiseries and laminated pastries.
- Chocolate tempering, sugar pulling, mirror glazing
- Thermomix, blast freezer, stand mixers, silpat tools
- Team scheduling, cost control, quality assurance
✓ Best Pastry Creation – Montreal Sweets Expo, 2022
✓ Top 10 Artisanal Pâtissiers – French Culinary Review, 2021
Diplôme de Pâtisserie – École Ferrandi Paris | 2012 – 2014
Advanced Chocolate Techniques – Barry Callebaut Academy | 2019
